p: Results: 65 patients were included in the study: 40 with sepsis, 13 with severe sepsis and 12 with septic shock. PCT concentration was significantly increased in subjects with septic shock when compared to sepsis (Table 3,*p = 0.001, Kruskal-Wallis test). IL-8 concentration was significantly increased in septic shock compared to both sepsis and severe sepsis groups (Table 3, **p < 0.001 and p = 0.013 respectively, Kruskal-Wallis test). Using ROC analysis, IL-8 was found to be a significant predictor of mortality (AUC 0.92, p < 0.001).
